meanings.definition: The quality or state of being definite or conclusive.
meanings.sent1: The definitiveness of his decision left no room for doubt.
meanings.sent2: The definitiveness of the answer made it easy to understand.
meanings.sent3: Her definitiveness in choosing the movie surprised everyone.
meanings.sent4: The definitiveness of the rule was like a solid wall, impossible to bend.
meanings.sent5: The definitiveness of the deadline was like a ticking clock, urging us to finish on time.

meanings.definition: The quality of being clearly defined or resolved.
meanings.sent1: The definitiveness of the map helped us navigate easily.
meanings.sent2: The definitiveness of the instructions made the task straightforward.
meanings.sent3: His definitiveness in organizing the event made it a success.
meanings.sent4: The definitiveness of her decision was like a beacon in the fog of uncertainty.
meanings.sent5: The definitiveness of the contract was as clear as a crystal, leaving no room for misinterpretation.
